Licencing
=========

The lassoBag package uses several third-party tools and methods in order to process data.Â The following list contains all tools or methods with respective links to the corresponding webpages. For licencing information regarding these methods and tools, please see the respective web pages.

    * `glmnet <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/glmnet/index.html>`_
    * `POT <http://pot.r-forge.r-project.org/>`_


The lassoBag package is available free of charge for academic purposes.
